text:
SVGApplication and Batik libraries were downloaded; SVG compiled under jikes;
running SVGApplication allowed specification of SVG file to load, but during the
load the JVM crashed with the message:
#
# HotSpot Virtual Machine Error, Unexpected Signal 11
# Please report this error at
# http://java.sun.com/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi
#
# Error ID: 4F533F4C494E55580E43505005BC
#
# Problematic Thread: prio=1 tid=0x82148d8 nid=0x4c54 runnable
#
Abort
creator: eric.minch@lionbioscience.com

text: Recompile with javac: jikes sometimes produce invalid bytecodes.
creator: hillion@apache.org
